section.p: Although currently, there isn't Javadoc2DITA section in the Docfacto.xml, the Doclet still requires the location of the configuration xml. This is specified via the JavaDoc additionalparam. The reason for this is because the taglets will still be honoured as taglets can be used for DITA as well as HTML.
In addition to the normal Javadoc parameters, there is a slight change, where as -doctitle is now used as the title of the root DITA map
